title: [REFACTOR] Split large auth store (1600+ lines) into modules
body:
## Problem
The auth store is a monolithic 1600+ line file handling too many responsibilities.

## Tasks
- [ ] Analyze current responsibilities
- [ ] Design modular structure
- [ ] Extract authentication module
- [ ] Extract authorization module
- [ ] Extract token management
- [ ] Update all imports
- [ ] Add comprehensive tests

## Acceptance Criteria
- No single module > 300 lines
- Clear separation of concerns
- All tests pass
- No functionality regression

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 13 story points
